community_space.name: community_space
community_space.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
community_space.title: Community Space
community_space.description: Whether for love of vintage records or a shared city to call home, communities are a powerful way to discover and nurture common ground with others. This Experience offers some templates to help you get your special-interest community up and running.

crm_basic_approach.name: crm_basic_approach
crm_basic_approach.author: https://github.com/geladariia
crm_basic_approach.title: CRM: Basic Approach
crm_basic_approach.description: Simplified approach for those who need a personalised system with orders/projects and who work with not too much customer/client data.

daily_journal.name: daily_journal
daily_journal.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
daily_journal.title: Daily Journal
daily_journal.description: 95% of our thoughts are repetitive. Build a ritual of daily journaling to cultivate presence and reflect on your thought patterns.

data_vault.name: data_vault
data_vault.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
data_vault.title: Data Vault
data_vault.description: Keep encrypted copies of your essential documents so you are never caught unprepared.

family_space.name: family_space
family_space.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
family_space.title: Family Space
family_space.description: Welcome to your very own Family Space, where everything you share is reserved solely for those closest to you. Designed knowing that every family is unique, we hope this experience will make communication and organization easy and enjoyable for your family.

frm_friends_relationship_management.name: frm_friends_relationship_management
frm_friends_relationship_management.author: https://github.com/geladariia
frm_friends_relationship_management.title: FRM: Friends Relationship Management
frm_friends_relationship_management.description:
FRM - is not just about «managing» your friends. It’s also about a simple idea, that being friends means paying attention.
Organize & remember your meetings, convert them into thoughts & feelings, and don’t forget your friends during this busy time online.

habit_tracker.name: habit_tracker
habit_tracker.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
habit_tracker.title: Habit Tracker
habit_tracker.description: Become your best self and document the results of your healthy habits. Track your sleep, energy, mood and more using a habit tracker.

homepages.name: homepages
homepages.author: https://github.com/geladariia
homepages.title: Homepages
homepages.description: Just some simple ideas for developing your start page, if you don't know where to start!

language_flashcards.name: language_flashcards
language_flashcards.author: https://github.com/geladariia
language_flashcards.title: Language Flashcards
language_flashcards.description: Practise the new language by creating beautiful cards with images as visual associations, descriptions as translations and pop-up spoilers in text, linking cards to other objects.

legacy_homepage.name: legacy_homepage
legacy_homepage.author: https://github.com/filip-anytype
legacy_homepage.title: Legacy Homepage
legacy_homepage.description: Re-creation of the old homepage design from the Anytype Alpha days.

movie_database.name: movie_database
movie_database.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
movie_database.title: Movie Database
movie_database.description: For true cinema aficionados: Build your very own knowledge base of watched and bucket list movies with this Movie Database template.

neighbors_space.name: neighbors_space
neighbors_space.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
neighbors_space.title: Neighbors Space
neighbors_space.description: Whether you live in a big city or in the quiet suburbs, creating community with those closest to you makes everyone's shared life better. Designed for practical communication and exchange between neighbors, we hope you'll enjoy connecting with your neighbors!

paid_subscriptions_tracking.name: paid_subscriptions_tracking
paid_subscriptions_tracking.author: https://github.com/geladariia
paid_subscriptions_tracking.title: Paid Subscriptions Tracking
paid_subscriptions_tracking.description: Track recurring expenses by saving your subscription information in one place.

para_lite.name: para_lite
para_lite.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
para_lite.title: PARA - Lite
para_lite.description: An approach towards digital minimalism & productivity based on Tiago Forte's popular method. This experience uses collections, tags, and sets to help you make order of your graph.

plant_database.name: plant_database
plant_database.author: https://github.com/geladariia
plant_database.title: Plant Database
plant_database.description: Add characteristics, care, growing details and create a database of your plants using a customisable template.

project_management.name: project_management
project_management.author: https://github.com/geladariia
project_management.title: Project Management
project_management.description: Focused on planned objectives and daily/weekly tasks, an organised flow will help you keep track of personal projects.

recipe_book_and_meal_planner.name: recipe_book_and_meal_planner
recipe_book_and_meal_planner.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
recipe_book_and_meal_planner.title: Recipe Book and Meal Planner
recipe_book_and_meal_planner.description: Good food, good mood. Categorize recipes based on your personal needs and create meal plans that suit your time, taste, and dietary preferences.

space_for_digital_creators.name: space_for_digital_creators
space_for_digital_creators.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
space_for_digital_creators.title: Space for Digital Creators
space_for_digital_creators.description: Whether you're a creator in the field of personal health, gaming, skincare or self-improvement, here's a space for you to cultivate evergreen content and grow your community. Use it to create announcements, add recommendations, or links to your own articles.

startup_planner.name: startup_planner
startup_planner.author: https://github.com/geladariia
startup_planner.title: Startup Planner
startup_planner.description:
Startup Planner will help you develop an idea for a new business project: the groundwork is already laid in the Experience. 
Use this plan as a guide to action, finding detailed steps and points for further research.

study_hub.name: study_hub
study_hub.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
study_hub.title: Study Hub
study_hub.description: One place to keep your course schedule, syllabus, study notes, assignments, and tasks. Link it all together in the graph for richer insights.

team_space.name: team_space
team_space.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
team_space.title: Team Space
team_space.description: A space to collaborate with your teammates. Designed for small, techy teams that don't want their productivity hindered by server outages. Includes a team wiki, bugs tracker, and events calendar.

trip_planner.name: trip_planner
trip_planner.author: https://github.com/charlotte-chiang
trip_planner.title: Trip Planner
trip_planner.description: Travel with half the hassle. Keep your tickets, bookings, and reference information all in one place, so you do not need to fuss over wifi while traveling.

zettelkasten_smart_notes.name: zettelkasten_smart_notes
zettelkasten_smart_notes.author: https://github.com/geladariia
zettelkasten_smart_notes.title: Zettelkasten: Smart Notes
zettelkasten_smart_notes.description:
The Zettelkasten method is about optimising your workflow of writing and producing knowledge. 
Smart notes system is like a second brain, helping you to explore new ideas and views in a way that they can be easily discovered and reused.

a_student_need.name: a_student_need
a_student_need.author: https://github.com/DaytonID
a_student_need.title: A Student Need
a_student_need.description: Students can use this template to plan homework tasks and exam arrangements for each semester.

actionable_items.name: actionable_items
actionable_items.author: https://github.com/francodgstn
actionable_items.title: Actionable Items
actionable_items.description: A simple personal backlog for Anytype, designed for real life. Focus on what matters —your wishes, tasks, and more— without the hassle of due dates or complex planning.

advanced_project_management.name: advanced_project_management
advanced_project_management.author: https://github.com/canpolatbaris
advanced_project_management.title: Advanced Project Management
advanced_project_management.description: Manage projects by creating milestones and goals, track tasks, and manage your risks.

adventure_hub.name: adventure_hub
adventure_hub.author: https://github.com/Adventure-nerd
adventure_hub.title: Adventure Hub
adventure_hub.description: Here you can track your adventure plans or "bucket list" adventures. I have included several Adventure Types to make it easier. Anything that is irrelevant to you , you can delete the Type in the library, and the corresponding set.

animation_database.name: animation_database
animation_database.author: https://github.com/Fradeet
animation_database.title: Animation Database
animation_database.description: The experience can help you manage and track anime, character, music, related news. Version 1, base and test on Japanese animation.

anti_aging_workout_by_bryan_johnson.name: anti_aging_workout_by_bryan_johnson
anti_aging_workout_by_bryan_johnson.author: https://github.com/Balcion
anti_aging_workout_by_bryan_johnson.title: Anti-Aging Workout by Bryan Johnson
anti_aging_workout_by_bryan_johnson.description:
Please note that all content is the original work of Bryan Johnson! Everything Bryan does is free and shareable! I've edited and structured the parts for convenience.

HD files-> https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Af4WFHazjYaK02nye8soLQ-cHhrf-Dy

anyday.name: anyday
anyday.author: https://github.com/minhashemi
anyday.title: AnyDay
anyday.description: Turn your words into memories with AnyDay, capturing and reflecting on life's moments.

anytype_for_content_creators.name: anytype_for_content_creators
anytype_for_content_creators.author: https://github.com/AlderpenGhub
anytype_for_content_creators.title: AnyType for Content Creators
anytype_for_content_creators.description: This template is a simple tool to allow new Content Creators to have a way to manage and track their video production workflow. With an intuitive menu on the left and author notes with video tutorials that will be coming in April of 2024.

classical_music_database.name: classical_music_database
classical_music_database.author: https://github.com/Fradeet
classical_music_database.title: Classical Music Database
classical_music_database.description:
You can use this gallery to record the classical music, and track which had listened.
- Set 'Create': default template.
- Build-in template improve your input.
- Quick check info on in-line set.
- 'Useful Classical Resource' collection can save something.

coffee_tracker.name: coffee_tracker
coffee_tracker.author: https://github.com/p1xelll
coffee_tracker.title: Coffee Tracker
coffee_tracker.description: Embark on your coffee journey with half the effort. Keep your coffee types, brewing methods, and taste impressions all in one place.

create_your_own_world.name: create_your_own_world
create_your_own_world.author: https://github.com/DaytonID
create_your_own_world.title: Create Your Own World
create_your_own_world.description: Focus on yourself and record every experience in your life.

crochet_dashboard.name: crochet_dashboard
crochet_dashboard.author: https://github.com/sfal
crochet_dashboard.title: Crochet Dashboard
crochet_dashboard.description: All-in-one hub for managing your crochet projects, yarn collection, and patterns. Record your project details such as yarn used, hook size, and pattern. Keep a catalog of your yarn stash with details such as brand, color, fiber and so on.

customizable_dashboard.name: customizable_dashboard
customizable_dashboard.author: https://github.com/pikacho13
customizable_dashboard.title: Customizable Dashboard
customizable_dashboard.description: Dashboard: major project links, task overview. Routine tasks are habitual. Personal & Work tasks prioritized (1-3), optional reminders. Quick notes for temp ideas. Custom templates for easy access. Customize as desired.

essence_pkm.name: essence_pkm
essence_pkm.author: https://github.com/chronix1710
essence_pkm.title: Essence PKM
essence_pkm.description: Not sure where to start your PKM journey? This Essence PKM experience gives you an all-in-one place to manage every aspect of life: Productivity, Self, Routine, Interest, Wealth. It's also a complete framework with detailed methodology and guidance built in.

essence_tkm.name: essence_tkm
essence_tkm.author: https://github.com/chronix1710
essence_tkm.title: Essence TKM
essence_tkm.description: Are you a solo developer or a regular tech consumer? Neither does matter because this Essence TKM experience gives all an all-in-one place with detailed methodology to learn & collect tech & project. Note that data in screenshots is for visualization purpose.

focus_matrix_all_in_one_page.name: focus_matrix_all_in_one_page
focus_matrix_all_in_one_page.author: https://github.com/DaytonID
focus_matrix_all_in_one_page.title: Focus Matrix-All In One Page
focus_matrix_all_in_one_page.description: A compact, all-in-one tool for daily reflections, task prioritization, and personal growth, keeping everything organized on a single page.

freelance_dashboard.name: freelance_dashboard
freelance_dashboard.author: https://github.com/p1xelll
freelance_dashboard.title: Freelance Dashboard
freelance_dashboard.description: Keep everything for your business in one place. Manage clients, projects, tasks and meetings all in one place and stay on top of your finances.

g_o_a_t_system.name: g_o_a_t_system
g_o_a_t_system.author: https://github.com/icreateeffects
g_o_a_t_system.title: G.O.A.T System
g_o_a_t_system.description:
G.O.A.T System
G – Goals: Set clear long and short-term Projects.
O – Orientation: Morning ritual to choose 2-3 priority tasks and task planning.
A – Achievements: Evening log of wins & lessons.
T – Tasks: Your Daily Tasks which work as notes.

gaming_hud.name: gaming_hud
gaming_hud.author: https://github.com/Fryker
gaming_hud.title: Gaming Hud
gaming_hud.description: This experience is meant to offer a place where you can keep all your games organized, both those you own and those you want to own, as well as keep track of which ones you have completed, planned, played, etc.

gear_log.name: gear_log
gear_log.author: https://github.com/GitYohan
gear_log.title: Gear Log
gear_log.description: Tired of digging through emails for receipts or wondering if your gear’s still under warranty? This log keeps everything in one place, purchases, serials, repairs, and more, so you always know what’s what, and when it needs love.

healthos.name: healthos
healthos.author: https://github.com/GitYohan
healthos.title: HealthOS
healthos.description: Track your full medical history. Visits, bills, and medications, in one organized, offline and encrypted system. Start with a visit and link everything else from there.

integrated_library.name: integrated_library
integrated_library.author: https://github.com/ChristianHaake
integrated_library.title: Integrated Library
integrated_library.description: Integrated library is a display of the books you read, or you are still reading. It includes Covers, tags and other attributes.

items_lent_out_borrowed_tracker.name: items_lent_out_borrowed_tracker
items_lent_out_borrowed_tracker.author: https://github.com/nima9
items_lent_out_borrowed_tracker.title: Items Lent out/Borrowed Tracker
items_lent_out_borrowed_tracker.description: This is really useful for keeping tracking of things that I have borrowed or things I have lent out to others.

jcdflashcards.name: jcdflashcards
jcdflashcards.author: https://github.com/jcdescy
jcdflashcards.title: jcdFlashcards
jcdflashcards.description: Inspired by [@geladariia](https://github.com/geladariia)'s Language Flashcards Experience, which I would absolutely use for language learning. However I have a different use case, so I tried my hand at my own version. Feedback always welcome.

journal_diary.name: journal_diary
journal_diary.author: https://github.com/DaytonID
journal_diary.title: Journal & Diary
journal_diary.description: This is the interface of a journal planning system. The overall layout is simple and bright, allowing users to easily manage and record their goals, plans, and daily life details.

meeting_notes_management.name: meeting_notes_management
meeting_notes_management.author: https://github.com/ChristianHaake
meeting_notes_management.title: Meeting Notes Management
meeting_notes_management.description: Object type, template and set for meeting notes management. Check the article for a full explanation: https://haak3.de/articles/2023_Anytype/2023_Anytype-Meetingnotes/2023_Antype-Meetingnotes-EN.html

para_and_coder_setup.name: para_and_coder_setup
para_and_coder_setup.author: https://github.com/ChristianHaake
para_and_coder_setup.title: PARA and CODER Setup
para_and_coder_setup.description: The PARA concept, which divides information into the categories of Projects, Areas, Resources, and Archives, provides a structuring level that organizes processes and knowledge in a clear and comprehensible manner. For a detailed explanation, check the article: https://haak3.de/articles/2023_Anytype/2023_Anytype-mit-PARA/2023_Using-PARA-with-Anytype-EN.html

para_tasks_resources_meeting_notes_crm.name: para_tasks_resources_meeting_notes_crm
para_tasks_resources_meeting_notes_crm.author: https://github.com/ChristianHaake
para_tasks_resources_meeting_notes_crm.title: Fully integrated Experience
para_tasks_resources_meeting_notes_crm.description:
This Experience includes the following aspects: PARA, Meeting notes, CRM, Library, Wiki, Tasks and Projects. For in detail explanation, check out my articles:
- https://haak3.de/articles/2023_Anytype/2023_Anytype-Dashboard/2023_Anytype-Dashboard-EN.html
- https://haak3.de/articles/2023_Anytype/2023_Anytype-Meetingnotes/2023_Antype-Meetingnotes-EN.html
- https://haak3.de/articles/2023_Anytype/2023_Mein-PKM_mit-CODE/2023_MY-PKM-with-Code.html
- https://haak3.de/articles/2023_Anytype/2023_Anytype-mit-PARA/2023_Using-PARA-with-Anytype-EN.html

para_with_collections.name: para_with_collections
para_with_collections.author: https://github.com/wjkw1
para_with_collections.title: PARA with Collections
para_with_collections.description: Organise your life in Anytype by using PARA with Collections. Harness the power of queries, collections, custom properties, smart dashboards, and flexible templates for clarity, scalability, and productivity managing your personal knowledge and projects.

personal_and_work_pkm.name: personal_and_work_pkm
personal_and_work_pkm.author: https://github.com/MarcoBarna
personal_and_work_pkm.title: Personal and Work PKM
personal_and_work_pkm.description: This experience seamlessly integrates work and personal knowledge, offering a mobile-friendly interface. It can be used to enhance collaboration. Each template includes links to tasks, contacts, or companies, making it intuitive and efficient to use.

plant_tracker.name: plant_tracker
plant_tracker.author: https://github.com/p1xelll
plant_tracker.title: Plant Tracker
plant_tracker.description: Plant Tracker is your digital plant oasis. Keep your houseplant jungle organised with details like watering schedules, light requirements and happy snaps to track their growth.

podcast_database.name: podcast_database
podcast_database.author: https://github.com/R0verDan
podcast_database.title: Podcast Database
podcast_database.description: Keep track of your favourite podcasts, with the ability to rate, sort through genre, note production houses and distributors, and link to websites and Spotify pages. Easily expandable and adaptable.

routine_set_ticker.name: routine_set_ticker
routine_set_ticker.author: https://github.com/darshansharma
routine_set_ticker.title: Routine Set Ticker
routine_set_ticker.description: Crossing off daily habits, routines, or tasks provides that much-needed "shot in the arm" of dopamine, propelling you forward. It ensures that you "keep the ball rolling," even when the temptation to stop is strong, thus cultivating a "can-do" attitude.

rpg_repository.name: rpg_repository
rpg_repository.author: https://github.com/7ede
rpg_repository.title: RPG Repository
rpg_repository.description: Dear DMs, this Experience will allow you to manage the Campaigns of your favorite RPGs with a series of elements designed to archive information with order and precision. The whole thing is adaptable to different rulesets with ease. Demo campaign included!

service_catalog.name: service_catalog
service_catalog.author: https://github.com/mishachepi
service_catalog.title: Service Catalog
service_catalog.description: This template will help you organize your resources in the digital world. It allows you to track subscriptions, monitor accounts and navigate your digital resources of any type: social networks, applications, subscriptions, etc.

simple_second_brain.name: simple_second_brain
simple_second_brain.author: https://github.com/CH1HU4HU4
simple_second_brain.title: Simple Second Brain
simple_second_brain.description: A simple second brain for getting on top of things without losing your mind or having setup paralysis

simple_tables.name: simple_tables
simple_tables.author: https://github.com/geladariia
simple_tables.title: Simple Tables
simple_tables.description: A collection of table templates with examples to use for a variety of purposes.

solution_log.name: solution_log
solution_log.author: https://github.com/DaytonID
solution_log.title: Solution log
solution_log.description: A simple, easy-to-use template to record problems from daily life and work, with tools for reflection, solutions, and goal-setting.

space_for_student.name: space_for_student
space_for_student.author: https://github.com/DaytonID
space_for_student.title: Space for Student
space_for_student.description: Space for Student is a learning and task management tool designed for students, making it easy to track assignments, courses, and important tasks.

story_forge_project_manager.name: story_forge_project_manager
story_forge_project_manager.author: https://github.com/axisnova
story_forge_project_manager.title: Story Forge Project Manager
story_forge_project_manager.description:
A place to write and develop a fictional story and develop a more living and breathing fleshed out story.
Version 1

subscription_tracker.name: subscription_tracker
subscription_tracker.author: https://github.com/p1xelll
subscription_tracker.title: Subscription Tracker
subscription_tracker.description: Simplify your finances. Manage all your subscriptions in one place.

ultimate_student_os.name: ultimate_student_os
ultimate_student_os.author: https://github.com/ThatTakashi
ultimate_student_os.title: Ultimate Student OS
ultimate_student_os.description: The ultimate space for students! Student OS provides everything you need to take effective notes and ace all your classes. Student OS is also built to be extendable and customizable.

unified_space.name: unified_space
unified_space.author: https://github.com/emagech
unified_space.title: Unified Space
unified_space.description:
This setup is a unified system combining productivity and PKM with the possibility to filter personal and professional data.

It's an all-in-one solution that borrows elements from PARA and GTD methodologies in a visually minimalist setup.

yapkms_yet_another_pkm_space.name: yapkms_yet_another_pkm_space
yapkms_yet_another_pkm_space.author: https://github.com/telmob
yapkms_yet_another_pkm_space.title: YAPKMS - Yet Another PKM Space
yapkms_yet_another_pkm_space.description:
YAPKMS is an adaptation of the Second Brain's concept so that it can be used daily.
It's meant to be easy to use, yet, as organized as you want it to be. Remember, there's no 'one size fits all'. You are encoraged to customize this space the way you want to.

zen_system.name: zen_system
zen_system.author: https://github.com/Hexara7777
zen_system.title: Zen System
zen_system.description:
Easy to use system that partially follows the PARA methodology.
More details: https://community.anytype.io/t/zen-system-v0-2-added-to-experience-gallery/12791
